hi_IN {
    CurrencyElements { 
            "\u0930\u0942",
            "INR",
            ".",
    }
    LocaleID { "0439" }
    LocaleString { "hi_IN" }
    NumberPatterns { 
            "#,##0.###;-#,##0.###",
            "\u00A4 #,##,##0.00;-\u00A4 #,##,##0.00",
            "#,##0%",
    }
    ShortCountry { "IND" }
    localPatternChars { "GyMdkHmsSEDFwWahKzZ" }
}
